name: Perfect Shot (WillReardon)
description:
You control the projectile fired from a gun.  Destroy all enemies before they reach the shooter. You can aim your shot while sitting in the barrel but don't wait too long to shoot; the world moves slower once you've fired, giving you more control of the bullet and more time before the enemies reach the shooter.

Made in about 3 days for the 2020 Low-Rez Game Jam. The game uses a script on the camera to clamp all pixels into 64x64 grid. 

I hope you enjoy it and I'd love feedback on the game!
